title: Bubble Up Endless

thumbnailDetails.alt: Bubble Up Endless Free Online Game

headings.text: How to Play Bubble Up Endless
Tips and Tricks for Bubble Shooting
We'd Like to Hear From You

controls: Aim: Hold the left mouse buttonShoot: Release the button
Aim: Tap and holdShoot: Release to shoot
content.howToPlay:
A mass of bubbles will gradually descend downward, and your mission is to drop them all before they cover the screen. With your trusty bubble launcher (cannon), aim and pop bubbles. Shoot the mass and match at least three bubbles of the same color. When you make a match, the bubbles will drop into your baskets.

Blue bubbles: 50 pointsYellow bubbles: 100 pointsRed bubbles: 150 points

As you progress in the game, you'll encounter combo bubbles and coin bubbles. Dropping them will earn you more points and coins.
content.tips: Always try to pop bubbles that are positioned higher up. This strategy can lead to large sections of bubbles falling at once.Don't use boosters immediately. Save them for difficult situations where they can help you out of a tight spot.Make use of the walls to bounce your bubbles into hard-to-reach areas. This way, you can pop the bubbles that seem out of reach.Look at the color of the next bubble and plan your shots.Create combo shots by targeting groups of bubbles. Combos can clear the screen quickly, raisin your score up!

fullContent: Home› ColorBubble Up EndlessBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenPop 'em all! Bubble Up Endless is an HTML5 bubble shooter game that you can play on both mobile devices and computers. Position your bubble-shooting cannon, hit the falling bubbles, and drop them into your buckets. Get ready for endless fun, ASMR sounds, and stress relief. It's time to start playing and let the relaxation begin!ControlsDesktops and LaptopsAim: Hold the left mouse buttonShoot: Release the buttonMobile DevicesAim: Tap and holdShoot: Release to shootHow to Play Bubble Up EndlessA mass of bubbles will gradually descend downward, and your mission is to drop them all before they cover the screen. With your trusty bubble launcher (cannon), aim and pop bubbles. Shoot the mass and match at least three bubbles of the same color. When you make a match, the bubbles will drop into your baskets.Blue bubbles: 50 pointsYellow bubbles: 100 pointsRed bubbles: 150 pointsAs you progress in the game, you'll encounter combo bubbles and coin bubbles. Dropping them will earn you more points and coins.BoostersYou might be wondering, "What can I do with Bubble Up coins?" You can buy boosters! There are four types of boosters available during gameplay:Bomb: Removes all surrounding bubbles (60 coins)Rainbow: Removes one color of bubbles (70 coins)Rocket: Removes bubbles in its path (90 coins)Lightning: Removes a row of bubbles (110 coins)Tips and Tricks for Bubble ShootingAlways try to pop bubbles that are positioned higher up. This strategy can lead to large sections of bubbles falling at once.Don't use boosters immediately. Save them for difficult situations where they can help you out of a tight spot.Make use of the walls to bounce your bubbles into hard-to-reach areas. This way, you can pop the bubbles that seem out of reach.Look at the color of the next bubble and plan your shots.Create combo shots by targeting groups of bubbles. Combos can clear the screen quickly, raisin your score up!More Online GamesWhy not try breaking bricks next in Idle Breakout and keep the stress relief going? Or play with Elastic Man Morty's face and mess with him? As the Bubble Up is endless, the fun is so on OnlineGames.io.We have dozens of HTML5 games you can enjoy during a quick break at the office or while waiting for the train.
